mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM kriptcareer WHERE jbskid = #{jbskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM kriptcareer WHERE jbskid = #{jbskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY iptstart ASC

SELECT * FROM kriptcareer WHERE IPTID = #{iptId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
AND IPTCOMPANY = #{iptCompany} AND IPTWH = #{iptWh} AND IPTSTART = #{iptStart} AND IPTEND = #{iptEnd} AND POSID = #{posId}
